item.title: Deploy to Elastic Beanstalk with GitHub Actions
item.description: AWS Elastic Beanstalk makes deploying, managing, and scaling .NET web applications on Amazon Web Services easy. This powerful service is available to anyone developing or hosting .NET apps on IIS. In this post, I’ll demonstrate how to set up a continuous deployment pipeline to Elastic Beanstalk directly from GitHub using GitHub Actions. With just a […] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/deploy-to-elastic-beanstalk-environment-with-github-actions/
